modName: RS Children Overhaul - Shine Fix (no more ugly bronze shine)
summary: Fix the shine bug of RS Children Overhaul (no more ugly bronze shine)
descriptionHtml:
It fixes the shine bug of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555]RS ChildrenÂ Overhaul[/url] by [b]Ranaline[/b], look at the screenshots.

It happens that you can see the shine on some kids but not on the others because the shine depends from the lights around.
The shine bug is also a common problem with UNP, so if your adults have this bug use the mod from COTS linked below.
I used the trick of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/]No More Ugly Bronze Shine[/url] by [b]COTS[/b]. :)


[b]Installation :[/b] just extract it to the skyrim folder.
You [u]have to[/u] say "yes" when it asks you to override or the fix won't work.



Credits :
COTS for the trick
Ranaline for his awesome mod
Bethesda as usual
Microsoft for the Paint tool used to make the fix. :>
author: Lurihaut - COTS
